member.name: T:MassTransit.Log4NetIntegration.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions
member.summary: Extensions for configuring MassTransit for log4net

member.name: M:MassTransit.Log4NetIntegration.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions.UseLog4Net(MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator)
member.summary: Specify that you want to use the Log4net logging engine for logging with MassTransit.

member.name: M:MassTransit.Log4NetIntegration.Log4NetConfigurationExtensions.UseLog4Net(MassTransit.BusConfigurators.ServiceBusConfigurator,System.String)

member.param: The name of the log4net xml configuration file
